content.raw:
the implicit design in this implementation isn't what we want

I'm going to decline this and work on an implementation based on the proposed design in the following pull request:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdf_tutorials/pull-requests/7/pose-frame-semantics-proposal-for-new/diff
